title: When everyone is complaining about Camille, but you just pick Malphite and laugh and laugh and laugh

replies.body:
Too bad camille has true damage.

Rock-paper-True damage fuck you
Now we need a paper based champion and balance will be restored.
We already have that in the form of first tier turrets :^)
Damn...just damn...
All turrets.  The only turret that deserves its name is the nexus obelisk.
The fountain tower is retarded. The actual towers have the better ai
{{champion:4}} Uses paper
we have a winner.
Well, paper comes from trees so we have 2 tree based champs....{{champion:427}} {{champion:57}}
{{champion:13}}

dangit, i had a response for if this was in gameplay
*cough* true damage *cough*
http://blog.memes.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Chuck-chose-scissors.png

Camile was here...

And she chose true damage.
Im a simple man, I see Chuck Norris and I upvote.

. Ha. 

you get an upvote.
Every time someone challenges me to "rock-paper-scissors-shoot" I choose the "shoot". Gun > rock, paper, and scissors
Are you laughing to keep from crying because she still managed to Rick James slap you around the lane?
Well memed sir.
Just get an Alistar in the bot lane and not have to worry about Camille jumping on your adc or anyone in teamfights. Save your knockback for her ult and bump her out of it.
i shouldnt have to change my pick or item build in order to counter someone. i should be able to do the same exact thing every game and win.

I really hope you're trolling. This is a strategy game (albeit not as much as Starcraft or other RTS games, it still has some), which means adapting and doing different things in response to picks and item builds of the enemy.
I'd say in the past their was a lot more strategy, now it just feels like TDM
tfw A/S slows don't effect auto attack resets :(
it slows the auto attacks animation, so in a way it does (vi vs nasus showed me the pain of going for the trade q_q)
